Reviews.Title: Lasted a few months and quit
Reviews.Author: cat lover "cat lover"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for a reasonable price. The picture is clear, the sound is crisp, and it comes with a variety of doorbells. Would be great if there were controls to allow you to move the camera up and down, but otherwise it's great. It did take a little knowledge of wiring on my husband's part to install... not exactly plug-n-play. But I wasn't expecting that either.All in all, I recommend this product. Once installed, it is very easy to use.Follow-up:They have an insert that promises a free gift if you write a review. Turns out the gift is a warranty extension. Giant pain, requires submission on their website with serial number, link to review, etc. I did all of that, which required taking the screen off the mount, pulling wires loose to find the serial number, clicked submit.... and the form reset. After, of course, my husband had finally gotten the monitor remounted. Frustrating.It is a good product, but their website stinks, which doesn't bode well for future support.Follow-up on January 30, 2012:This product barely lasted 6 months. After 3 - 4 months, the image got fuzzy, now it doesn't work at all. If you live in the desert, this might work for you. But if there's any moisture in the air whatsoever, keep looking. I downgraded this to one star because of it. I'm now in the market for a new one... NOT this brand!

Reviews.Title: Needs vertical camera adjustment
Reviews.Author: McLean, VA
Reviews.Content: We received the system and were impressed by the clarity of the picture and how easy it was to install, however, there are two major issues with this product.  The first is that most doorbells are not at eye-level so to simply replace your doorbell with the camera (which is what is suggested), doesn't work.  The camera has a clip-on on the back to allow you to adjust horizontally but not one vertically so you have to essentially do a full-install instead of working with your two-wire doorbell.  The second issue is that the camera itself is bulky and looks cheap as a doorbell.  It is made of cheap plastic and you'll be suprised as soon as you take it out of the box.  I returned the product once I realize the lack of ability to vertically adjust the camera made it useless.

Reviews.Title: Very helpful for persons with limited mobility
Reviews.Author: designmaven
Reviews.Content: I bought this video/audio doorbell due to my decreasing mobility, as my front door is a half-flight between the two floors in my home. The system is very easy to use - the person at the door just pushes the doorbell, and when I hear the doorbell I just push one button on the screen to activate the camera to see and another button to activate the 2-way intercom to talk.  This enables me to see and speak with the person at the front door before deciding if I want to use my stairlift to go to the front door to let them in.  This has made it much easier for me to stay in my home and maintain my independence and safety.Installing the system is not as easy.  This system includes the outdoor doorbell/speaker unit and the outdoor camera unit as well as the indoor combination speaker/screen.  The outdoor units need to be wired into a power source inside the house, so you will have to drill and wire if these connections are not already in place.  The indoor speaker screen needs to be plugged into a power source.  To connect the outdoor and indoor components there is a single cable containing 2 wires - you have to split open the cable and connect one wire to the doorbell/speaker unit and one to the camera from inside the wall, then you have to run the cable through your home to connect both wires to the indoor screen/intercom unit, so you need to select where you want to locate the indoor screen, as it is tethered to the cable, as well as to the power-source cord.  However, the hard-wire connection provides a reliably clear sound and picture, and the night vision really works well too.  You also need to decide where to position the stationary outdoor camera so you can see children and adults of various heights;  I had mine set a bit high but angled down, so I sometimes have to ask people to step back or closer or left or right and to look up so I can see their face.  I hired an electrician to do all this work, but you may be handy enough to do it yourself.Note:  I also purchased the door-jam unlock component so I could unlock the front door from the indoor speaker/screen;  however, the company that had previously installed my metal front door, including the door frame and lock, declined to install this component, and also informed me that I would lose the door's fire-rating status if anyone cut or otherwise altered any portion of the door or its frame or lock.  I therefore did not install this component, and suggest you confirm if you can use it with your door before you order it.Bottom line, this unit has helped me a lot at a reasonable cost, even with the electrician's charges.  However, it would have been very helpful to have an up-front checklist of the above factors to consider before purchasing it.In the future I may consider a more expensive system with multiple outdoor cameras and a single wireless indoor screen/speaker unit if available, and I would also like to be able to remotely move the outdoor cameras so I could scan wider areas with each camera.

Reviews.Title: terrible not working and company doesnt coopearte either amazon we need our money back
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: package arrived no problem,we hired an electrician he hard wired the system when it was ready we plugged it in and the monitor doesnt respond keep on ringing the bell and comands dont work.its being 2 weeks no money back they just called from the manufacture telling us to ship the device back and if there is a problem in 4 -6 weeks they will return the money.shame on amazon!!!!we need our money backkkkkkkkk

Reviews.Title: Worked for less than one month
Reviews.Author: D. Adams
Reviews.Content: Yes, it is easy to install, and the features are very good.  But the entire thing is made of plastic, including the housing for the outdoor unit.  Very cheap construction and not real weather resistant.  We installed the unit this summer, and within 3 weeks, the audio stopped working.  We sent it back, got another unit, installed it, and two weeks later, both the audio and video went out (though the door unlock feature still worked).  We are returning this unit and getting a refund.  We live in Southern California where the weather is mild (no rain since it was installed), so I would imagine in a harsh climate, this unit would perform even more poorly.

Reviews.Title: Product DOA and vendor not responsive
Reviews.Author: L. Ross
Reviews.Content: The video intercom was DOA.  No sound, no picture, only an indicator that it had power. A call to the manufacturer support line didn't help. The vendor quickly sent an automated reply to my "Return" asking for one business day to respond. Six days (four business days) later, they still hadn't made any response. After my second contact, the vendor replied that I could return it at my cost. In addition to being defective, the product had a loose glued cover on the front, which was either a manufacturing defect or could have been due to an earlier attempt to repair. I suggest looking elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Junk !! Be careful
Reviews.Author: Dr. O
Reviews.Content: I purchased one about a year ago and it just stopped working at the end of about 2 months.  I actually ordered a second one thinking maybe the first one was just the "lemon" in the batch.  Installed it 1 month ago- stopped working AGAIN after three weeks.  Went from great quality picture to fuzzy, no sound and the switches stopped working including the on/off screen.  JUNK!! Save your money

Reviews.Title: Poor Product, non existent customer service.
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: First product was defective.  Non existent customer service. dozens of phone calls and 6 week finally replaced the product.  which is mostly  a poor quality toy.  Using existing bell wire not explained.  Eventually got it working after multiple tries.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Jessica G.
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our childcare center as an extra level of security for our children. The first thing that concerned me was when I opened the box, the screws for the system were just rolling around in the box. I didn't even know if it was all there. Once installed, the intercom system stopped working after about two weeks. We still use it for the video as that portion does allow us to see who is there. We just cannot talk to them with the system any longer. Video is excellent quality. I probably would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: realy works
Reviews.Author: bionic
Reviews.Content: Ben using it for the past year and it works good.  I installed it in a high trafic area and use it for my night window at my store when they lock the doors and only sell stuf from the night window.  The cashiers can here the people very easly.

Reviews.Title: Really Great System
Reviews.Author: Rommel Coelho
Reviews.Content: Upon receipt of the Item , I got it installed ...It was a BREEZE !Then it worked so beautifully , clear images & very good Night vision too ..I am very happy with the Product !!Thank you again SVAT & Amazon !

Reviews.Title: pretty darn good !
Reviews.Author: E. Ocean "JL"
Reviews.Content: installation was easy ! We have it for a home office, and it functions really well. The clarity is superb. Night vision is surprisingly CLEAR. facial features are clear and recognizable.It's amazing how clear the color screen is, and the sound is SUPER clear.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: AnnieG
Reviews.Content: We received a used camera system, no manual or stickers were included and the monitor was already wired to the camera. Talk didn't work and every time you would click the "Talk" button the video would turn off. Complete garbage. Returning.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Hussain Khalaf
Reviews.Content: Fist of all the item is deferent from the described one the one in the list is "SVAT VIS300" and the one I got was "Defender's Gatekeeper, GK300-7M2"Second the Item reached me defective and not working, LCD is showing White only and no display and it is costing me almost the same price of the item to return it back as I'm in Kingdom of Bahrain,really waist of time and money

Reviews.Title: Purchased 4 units & 2 still work
Reviews.Author: G.C. Dave
Reviews.Content: Purchased & installed 4 units two years ago.Replaced one unit and two units are still operating.Really like the idea of the product.Unfortunatly it did not last.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Khalid Gharib
Reviews.Content: I think the title provides an adequate review. I would return it but I had to alter the power wire to make it work in my environment. I wasted my money on a low grade product that does not work. Its a wonder that China has created so much weath for itself considering it makes products this poorly. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: Bad product. Would never recommend a buy.
Reviews.Author: Kumar
Reviews.Content: 1)Lots of background noise when some one speaks.2) Poor camera resolution.3) Constant freaking sound when Idle.I have returned the product. But waiting for refund money back,

Reviews.Title: Nearly perfect, whish it did more
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Works great for its intended purpose, though in what I considered to be a relatively short run I used the entire length of the cable, so watch for that. Easy to setup and use, but I wish the voltage out intended for door strikes was a simple contact closure relay, as that would work for door strikes (with their own power source) or for trigering any kind of automation task (what I was hoping to do with my ELK M1 Gold Security System). Also it seems the prices for products I place on my wishlist magically increase in price before I get around to purchasing them, for this one it was a 20% jump in price, but we had already made up our mind.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: elcasacesar
Reviews.Content: This intercom works great and it very easy to use it and install, realy have a good quality of sounds and image

Reviews.Title: I see you
Reviews.Author: Legacy
Reviews.Content: It works great nice and clear with video and voice great service support. I contacted the company and was able to chat with them and get my questions answered

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: soflITguy
Reviews.Content: i used my existing doorbell wire.. it works great, its nice to know who is there before you open the door!  quality is good, and it functions well.  field of view is narrow on camera, so take the time to allign it so you can see visitors well.

Reviews.Title: SVAT Color Video Intercom System
Reviews.Author: Bobbywires
Reviews.Content: The System works as advertised and I was able to use all of my existing bell wiring instead re-wiring the house.Did not like the idea of running an 110v plug into the area that I intended to mount the monitor.Since I was mounting the monitor next to the old doorbell, I replaced the old 110V to 16V ac doorbell transformer with a standard plug for the 15V DC power adapter that comes with the unit.I was then able to splice the existing doorbell wiring between the power adapter and supplied plug.The doorbell unit is plastic and kind of cheap looking, I would not recommend mounting it in the weather.The biggest problem is the inability to adjust the camera vertically or rotate the camera image.My doorbell button is mounted chest high and the electrical box was installed sideways in a brick facade.No way to change that without considerable expense.I mounted the camera sideways and used the one of the included horizontal angle boxes to point the camera upwards.The problem was the inside unit has to be mounted sideways to match the sideways video from the camera.My wife insisted that I mount the inside unit horizontally as intended, so my jerry rigged vertical camera now cuts the head off of anyone over 5'Calls to tech support are referred to a website where you have to submit your question. I was called back the next day but there was answer to my problem.

Reviews.Title: I like the unit real well
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: The unit looks real nice but unfortunately had to return because I thought it was wireless, but would have kept it, if I had another use for it.

Reviews.Title: Intercom system
Reviews.Author: Alisha G. Ragland
Reviews.Content: I am using this system to view/hear/talk to my kids in an upstairs bonus room. I like everything except the fact that you cannot increase the volume on the camera speaker... with the TV on, I will have to yell at the top of my lungs for them to ever hear me... but at least I can see them and they can ring me downstairs when they need to talk to me. Also, I think it would have been beneficial if the monitor had a hardwire system so you don' t see the cord and huge adapter plugged in on the wall when you wall mount it.

Reviews.Title: Great improvement
Reviews.Author: JG
Reviews.Content: This is a great improvement over the last model I had.  The speakers suck, but that's the only complaint I have.

Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: Ace
Reviews.Content: I love the item. It works great. I installed it on the second floor of my house and it works great all through out my full first floor.

Reviews.Title: Great product!..
Reviews.Author: Margie
Reviews.Content: I love my Video Intercom System..I am handicapped and have a hard time answering my door..With this system I am able to, not only, see my visitors, but also talk to them..Also, the government housing authority (where I live) approved of this system; so I had no problem having it installed..Therefore, I give it 5 stars..

Reviews.Title: SVAT VIS300-7M2 is Great Buy
Reviews.Author: D. Blankenship "Chief High Hackman"
Reviews.Content: Super easy to install. Picture is great both night and day. We bought it for security since you can't see out our front door and it is simple enough for our elementary school boys to use. Voices are clear both ways. Everyone in this house feels safer now. We just wish we had bought it sooner.

Reviews.Title: Good Option When You Don't Want To Run New Wiring
Reviews.Author: ThePlateau
Reviews.Content: This is an okay setup for the low tech individual. It is simple to install using the original doorbell wiring, though the terminal on the back of my indoor unit would not hold onto the wire as it should. Would much prefered a screw down attachment over the spring loaded one that failed to work properly, causing me to have to improvise. Overall, though, it is worth the price.

Reviews.Title: SVAT VIS300-7M2 Hands Free Video intercom System.
Reviews.Author: Second Hawaiian Island "Roy Ara"
Reviews.Content: It is working fine so far.  The color is faded but you can still make out the person at the door.  For the price it is very good.

Reviews.Title: SVAT VIS300-7M2
Reviews.Author: alice mcnally
Reviews.Content: This product gives us more peace of mind.  We can view who is at our door for our safety.  We would like to somehow connect to our home computer which has a larger screen remotely.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: Great product. I love it. The picture and sound are high quality! Can't go wrong with this purchase. Easy set up!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: works great, good quality product, i will tell all my customers of this great product.svat u are great to.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality
Reviews.Author: JCMESSIAS
Reviews.Content: Very good product quality, this is all I expected to get.I recommend to other buyers those are thinking to buy that.

Reviews.Title: This is one of the best
Reviews.Author: desmond marshall
Reviews.Content: Just bought my home and purchase this item,well I never knew it will work and look this good .voice is very clear and the same goes for the view cam.i want to get another screen for my bed room.

Reviews.Title: Hello Who dat?
Reviews.Author: Geronimo
Reviews.Content: Great system to allow me to see who is at the door without walking a long distance.  Arrived quickly with no problems and installation was simple.  Use with Mag Lock.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Robert Cole
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly.....speakers could be a little better....very easy to install very simple to set up ..safe secure peace of mind .

Reviews.Title: awesome product
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: i love this product its awesome, it provides the safety and control im looking for. i would recomend to storelike businesses

Reviews.Title: I can see you.
Reviews.Author: Rippedoff
Reviews.Content: Easy installation.  Would like a weather cover.  Image color is good, sound is great.  Can't wait when it goes wireless.

Reviews.Title: good deal!
Reviews.Author: Roberto Cury "robcury"
Reviews.Content: I've bought another brand 3 years ago, the microphone didn't worked!Now I'm experiencing good with the SVAT - all works just fine!, let's see untill when.God image, good mic & speaker. that's OK

Reviews.Title: Installed for Older parents
Reviews.Author: Harry
Reviews.Content: Installed on a city row home for 85 year old parents. Great product works as advertised. Great video picture. The view button can be used at any time just to see whats happening. We left the old door bell in place so when that is used you must first hit the view button then the talk button. Father likes to use it just to see what's going on down on the street.

Reviews.Title: Easy Installation
Reviews.Author: G-Man
Reviews.Content: The system looks great and the installation was very simple. I look forward to purchasing addtional products from Defender. They seem to have a very affordable and wide selection of products.

Reviews.Title: Excellent System
Reviews.Author: KB
Reviews.Content: Overall it works great,it has a very good resolution for its purpose, the sound of the door bell is very soft as well as the comunication with the visitor. we are not using the open feature, but its because we have an access control system that does that.

Reviews.Title: Nice looking system  BUT..........
Reviews.Author: Y. Edebali "CRESTNY"
Reviews.Content: We could not acomplised the voice comminication and electric strike is activated while you hold your finger on it and there is no sound to it to let people know they can just pull the door open.Video is niceInstalation is easy

Reviews.Title: Great Intercom System
Reviews.Author: tyesumi
Reviews.Content: I received my video intercom in a very timely fashion and was most pleased.  The quality of the video during the day and night was more than I expected.  Again, I am most pleased and thankful I was able to purchase it.

Reviews.Title: Display always on
Reviews.Content: After connecting, the display never turned off and the chime also stayed on all the time. Called the Tech support of SVAT and they advised to return the unit. Then called the actual seller (Not Amazon) , They said I cannot get a replacement and the refund must be issued then a new order has to be placed

Reviews.Title: SVAT Color Video Intercom
Reviews.Author: opochtli
Reviews.Content: I just installed this SVAT intercom last week.  The instructions indicated that it could be installed using existing bell wire and that is true. Once I decided where to mount the monitor I just had to fish our bell wire a couple of feet.The instructions were easy to follow, the package was complete with all of the necessary hardware, and the parts installed easily.Everything is working well with the exception that the color on the monitor is not very good. But the image is clear and the sound for the intercom is also clear. If it continues to function as it currently does I will be very pleased.I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: Part of the problem may have been that I was trying to go from the gate to my house.  I finally came up with a much simpler solution; just put a door bell out there.

Reviews.Title: SVAT VIS300-7M2 Hands Free 2-Wire Color Video Intercom System with 7" LCD...
Reviews.Author: nicholas
Reviews.Content: Good product, comes in handy when someone's at your front door. I would recommend this product to any and everyone.

Reviews.Title: Plug and Play
Reviews.Author: Ignacio Carpio
Reviews.Content: Solo fue necesario sacar de la caja y conectar. Use el mismo cable de mi viejo intercomunicador con un destornillador. Enseguida todo funciono. Sonido excelente y visión perfecta. Solo recomendaría mejorar la visión nocturna o colocar una luz cerca dela entrada que fue lo que hice.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Vince C
Reviews.Content: Great Quality.  Wish it could record and store videos as well however it works great otherwise.  very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: SVAT VIS 300
Reviews.Author: John Malone, NY
Reviews.Content: The product is exactly as advertised; the picture quality is good and installation is relatively easy. At this price point there are no disappointments.

Reviews.Title: savt ok
Reviews.Author: george
Reviews.Content: when it says SVAT it means it, it is a grant product. I am very happy with it thank you

Reviews.Title: intercom system
Reviews.Author: Howard
Reviews.Content: I received this item from Shoptronics within a short time.The volume was low. I contacted them and was shipped one to replace it.It is doing a very good job for me. I received a catalog withmy order and I have been looking at some items of interest. I shall be doing some more buss. with Shoptronics in the furture, as I believe to be a company to deal with.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fast & Hassle-Free Setup
See and Hear Everything with Video & Audio
Hands Free Operation
24 Hour Protection with Night Vision
Unlock Your Door with the Touch of a Button
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT VIS300-7M2 Hands Free 2-Wire Color Video Intercom System with 7" LCD Monitor and Night Vision Security Camera
